form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Extensions: The validity of a permit may, on good cause shown, be extended for a period or periods not exceeding one year from the original expiration date. Application for extension must be made prior to the expiration date shown on this permit. The application should be submitted not more than 90 days prior to the expiration date. It must, however, be submitted so as to be received by the officer authorized to act thereon prior to the expiration of the permit's validity.
